code: const KEY="pph:favorites";export function loadFavorites(){try{return new Set(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(KEY)||"[]"));}catch(_unused){return new Set();}}export function saveFavorites(set){localStorage.setItem(KEY,JSON.stringify(Array.from(set)));}export function isFav(id){return loadFavorites().has(id);}export function toggleFav(id){const set=loadFavorites();set.has(id)?set.delete(id):set.add(id);saveFavorites(set);return set;}
